Title: SDNavigation
Description: WP7 MVVM friendly Silverlight Navigation library (integrated with the Windows Phone Navigation Framework).
HomeWiki:
WP7 MVVM friendly Silverlight Navigation library (integrated with the Windows Phone Navigation Framework).

It is based on Laurent Bugnion's INavigationService idea and combined with Rob GarFootMVVM Navigation Framework approach to obtain the page context (via behavior).

**Coming soon posts + video tutorials **

Developed by the SilverDiagram Team
